summary.title: Mary & Don Deskey's 1924 Christmas Card (Greeting card)
Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Mary & Don Deskey’s 1924 winter holiday card. Vertical format block printed in black ink on green wove paper features stylized stained-glass-window design with cubist influence and gothic arch; above, Santa is seen with a Christmas tree, toys, and horse; below, various toys, gingerbread house, candle, and bell; lowest register with serif lettering that states “Mary & Don Deskey-1924”.

medium.value: Block printed on green wove paper

provenance: Robert M. Desky, San Mateo, CA, USA; 1993: acquired by Museum

summary.title: Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Notecard produced for the Colorado Springs Fine Arts Center featuring "Cloud Shadows," a drawing by Herbert Bayer (1947). Blank interior. Printed in black, verso, lower left: CLOUD SHADOWS - drawing / Herbert Bayer, American (1900- ) / Colorado Springs Fine Arts Center. Pairs with 2016-54-469 (envelope).

provenance: Herbert Bayer; Glenn Horowitz Bookseller, New York, NY; 2016: acquired by Museum

title.value: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year, Herbert and Joella Bayer

summary.title: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year, Herbert and Joella Bayer (Greeting card)
Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Herbert and Joella Bayer Christmas card. Photomontage print featuring one side of a snowy wooden building with four open squares for windows. In background, sepia-toned image of snowy forest. Printed text in black, upper margin: merry christmas and happy new year  herbert and joella bayer.

provenance: Herbert Bayer; Glenn Horowitz Bookseller, New York, NY; 2016: acquired by Museum

Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Herbert and Joella Bayer Christmas card. Blue print on silver background. Features a patterned globe at top and two cherubs at bottom. Printed in blue, along the bottom: merry christmas and a happy 1960 herbert and joella bayer.

provenance: Herbert Bayer; Glenn Horowitz Bookseller, New York, NY; 2016: acquired by Museum

title.value: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year from Herbert and Joella Bayer

Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Herbert and Joella Bayer Christmas card featuring abstract design with ovals, lines, curving lines, and circles in black and white on blue-green background. Printed in black, along the bottom: merry christmas and happy new year from herbert and joella bayer.

title.value: Merry Christmas & Happy New Year, Joella and Herbert Bayer

Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Joella and Herbert Bayer Christmas card. At center, a seven-pointed falling star with lines radiating upwards in raised metallic red foil. Printed in green, along the bottom: merry christmas & happy new year / joella / herbert } bayer.

medium.value: Print on light brown paper with embossed red foil

provenance: Herbert Bayer; Glenn Horowitz Bookseller, New York, NY; 2016: acquired by Museum

summary.title: Merry Christmas, Joella – Herbert Bayer (Greeting card)
Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Herbert and Joella Bayer Christmas card featuring black and white photographic reproduction of three birdhouses topped with a layer of snow. Each birdhouse has a unique shape—one sphere, one cube, one bow-tie—and each have geometric decoration. A snow-covered tree appears in the background. Printed in red, diagonally, bottom left: Merry Christmas; bottom right: joella – herbert / bayer.

provenance: Herbert Bayer; Glenn Horowitz Bookseller, New York, NY; 2016: acquired by Museum

title.value: Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year from Herbert Bayer

summary.title: Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year from Herbert Bayer (Greeting card)
Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design Department

description.value: Herbert Bayer Christmas card. Bifoliate leaf folded in quarters. At upper right, scene of burning fortified classical building. Two cupids below look up towards the scene. Printed in black, center left: merry christmas and a happy new year; left bottom: from herbert bayer.

provenance: Herbert Bayer; Glenn Horowitz Bookseller, New York, NY; 2016: acquired by Museum

She holds a bouquet of flowers in one hand, and in the other a sign with a greeting, in white on blue ground, sign: TO MY / [...]A[...]TINE. Her feet are attached with a hinge that rotates, allowing her to walk.
